Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses rerouted via 63rd, Merrill, 64th, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd over normal route, due to street blockage near 63rd/Cottage Grove

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Merrill, 64th, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd over normal route, due to street blockage near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
